title: Eguchi Hisashi no Nantoka Narudesho!
sinopse: Part anime, part live action, and part puppet show. This MAL entry duration will reflect the anime segment only. Nantoka Narudesho is a series of seemingly unrelated sketches. Viewer-be-warned, some sketches have not aged well and would be found extremely offensive due to racism, sexual depravity, and homophobia.

links.link: http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/江口寿史のなんとかなるでショ!
